Mod0_Description: While you have a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} active, casts of {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} treat enemies as if they were {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c}.
Mod4_Description: Hitting an enemy with {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} in a single cast makes them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds.
Mod5_Description: {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} have a {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%|]{/c} chance to ricochet to another enemy. {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} always ricochet off of {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.
name: Ice Shards
